title: Any update on when the Boards will be mobile friendly again?
body: You still cannot see your notifications while using the boards on mobile devices. I can see them if I'm navigating on the main Web page in sections like "Universe," but they're rather pointless when visible there and not in the boards where they are relevant. When will this be fixed?

replies.body:
sorry about the delays in getting this fixed, I know not having notification icons appear makes it really difficult to use Boards on phone, especially for our power users who post a lot. When we updated the navigation bar to be mobile responsive to better fit the boards, it created a bug that overlapped and hid the notifications by accident (it was not an intentional change to hide the notifications).

We have a fix that is currently going through QA to resolve the issue. Hopefully, it passes through with no issues and we can have the fix out soon. Until then, you may want to do what Slayertay6 mentioned about creating a bookmark for the updates link, it's not perfect but at least you can get around.

I'll post in this thread once we have another update. Sorry again for the hassles! :(
